Title: Appropriately Sized Pots
Writer: Jenji Kohan (creator), Alex Regnery, Hartley Voss, Piper Kerman (book), Sian Heder (story editor), Lauren Morelli (story editor), Nick Jones (story editor)
Actors: Taylor Schilling, Uzo Aduba, Danielle Brooks, Michael Harney
Plot: Piper faces a new backlash over special privileges; Capulo feels pressure to toughen up, resulting in administrative changes.
